render.tex: \title{Piece-wise Functions} Ability to read, understand \& work with piece-wise defined functions

reason.tex:
%text When a function is defined differently in different regions of it's domain, we say that the function is defined in pieces - or \underline\text{piece-wise defined} For example, $f(x) = \vert x\vert$ is defined as % \[ \qquad f(x) = \begin{cases}
-x, x < 0 \\ x, x\geq 0 \end{cases} \] %text Notice, the different definitions of $f(x)$ for $x\geq 0$ and $x < 0$%
